title: Dark Launcher when installing League on a new PC
body: Hi, I'm trying to install League on a new PC, and after running the installer, I get a very dark Launcher screen, which I cannot click nor close. I wonder if there is a way I can solve this issue. I saw several threads of people having simmilar issues with the new client, but this is not the case, because I have no old client files in this PC.

replies.body: When you saw the launcher is dark, do you mean that it's a completely black screen or is it dim?  Are you on the updated or legacy client?  Let me know!
btw this is in a Windows 8.1 Pro
